mapper.insert: INSERT INTO chat_record ( userId, friendId, talkType, msgContent, msgType, msgDate, createTime, updateTime ) VALUES ( #{userId}, #{friendId}, #{talkType}, #{msgContent}, #{msgType}, #{msgDate}, now(), now() )
mapper.select: SELECT userId, friendId, msgContent, msgType, msgDate FROM chat_record where talkType = 0 and (friendId = #{talkId} and userId = #{userId}) or (friendId = #{userId} and userId = #{talkId}) order by createTime desc limit 10
SELECT userId, friendId, msgContent, msgType, msgDate FROM chat_record where talkType = 1 and friendId = #{talkId} order by createTime desc limit 10
